entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
